SEARCH
Package wtf.file.api.builder

Schnittstelle WtfImageBuilder

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
WtfImageBuilderImpl
public interface WtfImageBuilder
The WtfImageBuilder class provides a fluent API for constructing instances of WtfImage. It allows setting various attributes such as dimensions, color space, and animation information required to define a WtfImage.

The builder ensures that all required fields are provided before the image can be built.

Siehe auch:

  • Felddetails

    • DEFAULT_VERSION

      static final Version DEFAULT_VERSION
      The default version used in the WtfImageBuilder when no specific version is provided. Defaults to VERSION_1.

      This version determines the structure and compatibility of the WtfImage being built.

      Seit:
      1.1
      Siehe auch:
      • Version.VERSION_1

    • DEFAULT_CHANNEL_WIDTH

      static final int DEFAULT_CHANNEL_WIDTH
      The default channel width for the WtfImage being built, measured in bits. This value specifies the bit depth for each channel in the color space and is set to 8 by default.

      It represents the typical bit depth used for most images, ensuring a balance between image quality and memory usage.

      Seit:
      1.1
      Siehe auch:
      • Konstantenfeldwerte

    • DEFAULT_FRAMES

      static final int DEFAULT_FRAMES
      The default number of frames for a WtfImage animation. This value is used when no specific frame count is set by the user. The default value is 1.
      Seit:
      1.1
      Siehe auch:
      • frames(int)
      • Konstantenfeldwerte

  • Methodendetails

    • version

      @Contract(value="_ -> this", mutates="this") WtfImageBuilder version(Version version)
      Sets the version for the WtfImage being built. Per default the version is set to VERSION_1
      Parameter:
      version - the version of the WtfImage to be set
      Gibt zurück:
      the current instance of WtfImageBuilder for method chaining
      Siehe auch:
      • Version.VERSION_1

    • width

      @Contract(value="_ -> this", mutates="this") WtfImageBuilder width(int width) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the width of the WtfImage being built. This value must be set, otherwise build will throw a ValueNotSetException.
      Parameter:
      width - the width of the image in pixels
      Gibt zurück:
      the current instance of WtfImageBuilder for method chaining
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the provided height value is out of the acceptable range (1-65 535)

    • colorSpace

      @Contract(value="_ -> this", mutates="this") WtfImageBuilder colorSpace(ColorSpace colorSpace)
      Sets the color space of the WtfImage being built. The color space determines how color information is represented and stored. This value must be set, otherwise build will throw a ValueNotSetException.
      Parameter:
      colorSpace - the color space to be used for the image, such as RGB, CMY, HSV, etc.
      Gibt zurück:
      the current instance of WtfImageBuilder for method chaining
      Siehe auch:
      • ColorSpace

    • channelWidth

      @Contract(value="_ -> this", mutates="this") WtfImageBuilder channelWidth(int channelWidth) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the channel width for the WtfImage being built. This value represents the bit depth of each channel in the color space. Per default the channel width is set to 8
      Parameter:
      channelWidth - the width of the channel in bits
      Gibt zurück:
      the current instance of WtfImageBuilder for method chaining
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the provided channelWidth value is out of the acceptable range (1-16)

    • frames

      @Contract(value="_ -> this", mutates="this") WtfImageBuilder frames(int frames) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the number of frames for the WtfImage being built. This value specifies the total number of frames in the animation. Per default the channel width is set to 1
      Parameter:
      frames - the number of frames
      Gibt zurück:
      the current instance of WtfImageBuilder for method chaining
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the provided frames value is out of the acceptable range (1-255)

    • framesPerSecond

      @Contract(value="_ -> this", mutates="this") WtfImageBuilder framesPerSecond(int fps) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the frames per second (fps) for the WtfImage being built. This value defines the playback speed of the animation.
      Parameter:
      fps - the frames per second value
      Gibt zurück:
      the current instance of WtfImageBuilder for method chaining
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the provided fps value is out of the acceptable range (1-127)

    • secondsPerFrame

      @Contract(value="_ -> this", mutates="this") WtfImageBuilder secondsPerFrame(int spf) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the seconds per frame for the WtfImage being built. This value determines the duration of each frame in the animation sequence.
      Parameter:
      spf - the seconds per frame, representing the duration of each frame in seconds
      Gibt zurück:
      the current instance of WtfImageBuilder for method chaining
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the provided seconds per-frame value is out of the acceptable range (1-127)

    • build

      @Contract(value="-> new", pure=true) WtfImage build() throws ValueNotSetException
      Builds and returns an instance of WtfImage based on the properties configured in the WtfImageBuilder. All mandatory properties (e.g., width, height, and color space) must be set before calling this method, otherwise, a ValueNotSetException will be thrown. All image frames will be filled with the default color of the color space.
      Gibt zurück:
      the constructed WtfImage instance
      Löst aus:
      ValueNotSetException - if any required property in the builder has not been set
      Siehe auch:
      • ColorSpace.defaultColor()
